Ruby.en: Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

Sapphire.en: Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

Emerald.en: Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

FireRed.en: The foe is attacked with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.
FireRed.de: Magischer Blattangriff, dem nicht auszuweichen ist.
